content: I'll definitely try to set a goal and track my progress. I think that will help me stay on top of my water intake. Also, I like the idea of infusing my water with fruits or herbs - it'll make drinking water more enjoyable. By the way, since I've started taking yoga classes on Tuesdays and Thursdays, I've noticed a big difference in my flexibility. My instructor, Rachel, has been really helpful and has given me some great modifications for poses that were tough for me at first.
